SKT_FIRST.name: Thump! Thump! Smash!
SKT_FIRST.true_desc: Attacks an enemy. Has a <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>1</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuff</color> from the caster.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_kr: 적을 공격하고 <color=#28d9ed>40%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>1개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_FIRST.true_desc_jp: 敵単体にダメージを与え、<color=#28d9ed>40%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>1個</color>解除する。

SKT_SECOND.name: Ritri Will Protect You!
SKT_SECOND.true_desc: (Passive Effect) Reduces the damage taken by all allies by <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_kr: (패시브 효과) 아군 전체가 받는 피해를 <color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color> 감소시킵니다.
SKT_SECOND.true_desc_jp: (パッシブ効果)味方全体の受けるダメージを<color=#28d9ed>2.5%</color>DOWNさせる。

2_jp: 受けるダメージの10%回復

SKT_ULTIMATE.name: Thump! Thump! Thump! Smash!
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc: Attacks all enemies. Grants a <color=#28d9ed>Barrier</color> to the ally with the lowest Health for <color=#28d9ed>2 turns</color>. The barrier strength is proportional to the caster's <color=#28d9ed>Max Health</color>.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_kr: 적 전체를 공격하고 체력 상황이 가장 나쁜 아군에게 <color=#28d9ed>실드</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2턴</color> 동안 부여합니다. 실드량은 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>최대 체력</color>이 높을수록 증가합니다.
SKT_ULTIMATE.true_desc_jp: 敵全体にダメージを与え、残りHPが最も低い味方単体に<color=#28d9ed>シールド</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2ターン</color>の間付与する。自分の<color=#28d9ed>最大HP</color>が高いほどシールド量がUPする。

SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.name: Chain Passive
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc: <color=#ffd732>Chain Companion Effect</color>: After attacking, recovers <color=#28d9ed>25</color> Action Points of the caster.\n\n<color=#ffd732>Dual Attack Effect</color>: After attacking, has a <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> chance to remove <color=#28d9ed>2</color> <color=#28d9ed>debuffs</color> from the caster.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_kr: <color=#ffd732>체인 컴패니언 효과</color> : 공격 후 자신의 AP를 <color=#28d9ed>25</color> 회복합니다.\n\n<color=#ffd732>협공 효과</color> : 공격 후 <color=#28d9ed>100%</color> 확률로 자신의 <color=#28d9ed>약화 효과</color>를 <color=#28d9ed>2개</color> 해제합니다.
SKT_CHAIN_PASSIVE.true_desc_jp: <color=#ffd732>チェーン効果(汎用)</color> : 攻撃後、APを<color=#28d9ed>25</color>獲得する。\n\n<color=#ffd732>連携効果</color> : 攻撃後、<color=#28d9ed>100%</color>の確率で自分の<color=#28d9ed>弱体効果</color>を<color=#28d9ed>2個</color>解除する。

2: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
2_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
3: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
3_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
4: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
4_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
5: +5% Dual Attack and Skill Chain damage
5_jp: チェーンスキルと連携ダメージ+5%
